original_text: Then he said to his disciples, “The time is coming when you will long to see one of the days of the Son of Man, but you will not see it.
korean_text: 또 제자들에게 이르시되 때가 이르리니 너희가 인자의 날 하루를 보고자 하되 보지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Then he said to his disciples
when you will long to see
one of the days of the Son of Man
but you will not see it.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 그것을 보지 못할 것이다.
